bioconda.name: ribotaper
bioconda.summary: RiboTaper is a new analysis pipeline for Ribosome Profiling (Ribo-seq) experiments, which exploits the triplet periodicity of ribosomal footprints to call translated regions.

biocontainers.name: ribotaper
biocontainers.summary: Ribotaper is a new analysis pipeline for ribosome profiling (ribo-seq) experiments, which exploits the triplet periodicity of ribosomal footprints to call translated regions.

galaxy.summary: A method for defining traslated ORFs using Ribosome Profiling data.
